description: Treat yourself in the morning to this delicious labne recipe with cinnamon, poached rhubarb and nut granola that will put you in a good mood for the rest of the day.
name: Healthier Cinnamon Labne With Poached Rhubarb & Nut Granola Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g tub Vaalia Probiotic Kefir Plain Yoghurt
1 bunch rhubarb, trimmed, cut into 3cm lengths
2 tsp orange zest, finely grated, plus extra (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt and cinnamon in a bowl. Line a fine sieve with muslin cloth. Place sieve over a bowl. Spoon yoghurt into lined sieve. Cover and refrigerate overnight to create labne.

Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line an oven tray with baking paper. Combine the oats, pistachios, sunflower seeds, olive oil, 3 tsp of maple syrup and cardamom in a bowl. Spoon onto prepared tray. Bake, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Allow to cool on tray.

Heat remaining syrup in a large non-stick frying pan. Add rhubarb. Stir to coat. Add orange juice and zest. Cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until rhubarb softens slightly but still holds its shape. Allow to cool.
Spoon labne into serving glasses. Top with rhubarb and mixed nut granola. Serve sprinkled with extra orange zest.
